alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Morgan; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:59PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Morgan, southeastern Rowan and Elliott Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 159 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Little Sandy, or near Sandy Hook, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Crockett around 205 PM EDT. Fannin Valley and Moon around 210 PM EDT. Sandy Hook and Isonville around 215 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Newfoundland, Stark, Culver and Bruin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
